events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return the item and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The customer's request has been categorized as a refund since they want their money back for a returned item.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. who handles refund related requests in the support team.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your order for a refund. I am happy to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return to help us process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was not as described on your website, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund right away once you send the product back. I will email you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful instructions! I appreciate your assistance with this return.
The return label email has been sent. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent back the product and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the product yesterday and received confirmation from the courier. Thank you for your help!
Your refund has been processed successfully and should be reflected on your payment method shortly. Thank you for your patience.
We are closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
